[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]{D3871}]@#/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa bzhugs so//[# ]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo [#]d+hi satwa tsar+ya a [#]ba tA ra/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
[\[1b.2\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde gshegs chos kyi sku mnga' sras bcas dang /_/phyag 'os kun la'ang gus par [#]phyag 'tshal te/_/bde gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa ni/_/lung
[\[1b.3\]]bzhin mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya/_/sngon chad ma byung ba yang 'dir brjod med/_/sdeb sbyor mkhas pa'ang bdag la yod min te/_/de phyir gzhan don bsam pa bdag la med/_/
[\[1b.4\]]rang gi yid la bsgom phyir ngas 'di brtsams/_/dge ba bsgom phyir bdag gi dad pa'i shugs/_/'di dag gis kyang re zhig 'phel 'gyur la/_/bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa
[\[1b.5\]]gzhan gyis kyang /_/ci ste 'di dag mthong na don yod 'gyur/_/dal 'byor 'di ni rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/skyes bu'i don sgrub thob par gyur pa la/_/gal te 'di la phan pa
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]ma bsgrubs na/_/phyis 'di yang dag 'byor par ga la 'gyur/_/ji ltar mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum na/_/glog 'gyu skad cig bar [#]snang ston pa ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas mthu yis
[\[2a.2\]]brgya lam na/_/'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 'byung /_/de ltas dge ba nyam chung nyid la rtag/[# ]/sdig pa stobs chen shin tu mi bzad pa/_/de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems min pa/_/
[\[2a.3\]]dge gzhan gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_/bskal pa du mar [#]rab dgongs mdzad pa yi/_/thub dbang rnams kyis 'di nyid phan par gzigs/_/'dis ni tshad med skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis/_/bde
[\[2a.4\]]mchog bde blag nyid du thob par byed/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal brgya phrag gzhom 'dod cing /_/sems can mi bde bsal bar 'dod pa dang /_/bde mang brgya phrag spyod [#]par 'dod pas kyang /_/byang chub sems
[\[2a.5\]]nyid rtag tu gtang mi bya/_/byang chub sems skyes gyur na skad cig gis/_/'khor ba'i btson rar bsdams pa'i nyam thag rnams/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi sras zhes brjod bya zhing /_/'jig rten lha mir
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]bcas pas phyag byar 'gyur/_/gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa mchog lta bu[#]/_/mi gtsang lus 'di blangs nas rgyal ba'i sku/_/rin chen [(]ring [,]rin [)]thang med par bsgyur bas na/_/byang chub sems zhes bya ba rab brtan zung /_/'gro ba'i ded dpon gcig pu
[\[2b.2\]]tshad med blos/_/legs par yongs su brtags na rin che bas/_/'gro ba'i gnas dang bral bar 'dod pa rnams/_/rin chen byang chub sems legs brtan par zung /_/dge ba gzhan kun chu shing bzhin du ni/_/'bras bu bskyed nas zad par
[\[2b.3\]]'gyur ba nyid/_/byang chub sems kyi ljon shing rtag par yang /_/'bras bu 'byin pas mi zad 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa shin tu mi bzad byas na yang /_/dpa' la brten nas 'jigs pa chen po ltar/_/gang la brten nas yud kyis sgrol 'gyur
[\[2b.4\]]ba/_/de la bag can rnams kyis cis mi brten/_/des ni dus mtha'i me bzhin sdig chen rnams/_/skad cig gcig gis nges par sreg [#]par byed/_/de yi phan yon dpag tu med pa dag_/byams mgon blo dang ldan pas nor bzangs [#]bshad/_/byang chub sems
[\[2b.5\]]de mdor bsdus [#]na/_/rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste/_/byang chub smon pa'i sems dang ni/_/byang chub 'jug pa nyid yin no/_/'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba yi/_/bye brag ji ltar shes pa ltar/_/de bzhin mkhas pas 'di gnyis kyi[#]/_/bye brag rim bzhin shes
[\[2b.6\]]par bya/_/byang chub smon pa'i sems las ni/_/'khor tshe 'bras bu che 'byung yang /_/ji ltar 'jug pa'i sems bzhin du/_/bsod nams rgyun chags 'byung ba min/_/gang nas bzung ste sems can khams/_/mtha' yas rab tu dgrol [#]ba'i phyir/_/mi
[\[2b.7\]]ldog pa yi sems kyis su/_/sems de yang dag blangs gyur pa/_/deng nas bzung [#]ste gnyid log gam/_/bag med gyur kyang bsod nams shugs/_/rgyun mi 'chad par du ma zhig_/nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'byung /_/'di ni 'thad pa dang bcas
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]par/_/lag bzang gis [#]ni zhus pa las/_/dman mos sems can don gyi phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/sems can rnams kyi klad nad tsam/_/bsal lo snyam du bsams na yang /_/phan 'dogs bsam pa
[\[3a.2\]]dang ldan de[#]/_/bsod nams dpag med ldan gyur na/_/sems can re re'i mi bde ba/_/dpag tu med pa bsal 'dod cing /_/re re'ang yon tan dpag med du/_/bsgrub par 'dod pa smos ci dgos/_/pha'am yang na ma yang rung /_/su la 'di 'dra'i phan sems
[\[3a.3\]]yod/_/lha dang drang srong rnams kyang rung /_/tshangs pa la yang 'di yod dam/_/sems can de dag nyid la sngon/_/rang gi don du [#]'di 'dra'i sems/_/rmi lam du yang ma rmis na/_/gzhan gyi don du ga la skye/_/gzhan dag rang gi don du yang /_/mi 'byung
[\[3a.4\]]sems can don sems gang /_/sems kyi rin chen khyad par 'di/_/snga [#]na med pa'i rmad cig 'khrungs/_/'gro ba kun gyi dga' ba'i rgyu/_/sems can sdug bsngal rtsir gyur pa/_/rin chen sems kyi bsod nams gang /_/de la ji ltar gzhal [#]gyis lang /_/
[\[3a.5\]]phan par bsams pa tsam gyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas mchod las khyad 'phags na/_/sems can ma lus thams cad kyi/_/bde don brtson pa smos ci dgos/_/sdug bsngal 'dor 'dod sems yod kyang /_/sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyug[# ]/bde ba 'dod
[\[3a.6\]]kyang gti mug pas/_/rang gi bde ba dgra ltar 'joms/_/gang zhig bde bas phongs pa dang /_/sdug bsngal mang ldan de dag la/_/bde ba kun gyis tshim pa dang /_/sdug bsngal thams cad gcod byed cing /_/gti mug kyang ni sel byed pa[#]/_/de dang dge mtshungs
[\[3a.7\]]ga la yod/_/de 'dra'i bshes kyang ga la yod/_/bsod nams de 'dra'ang ga la yod/_/phan btags lan lon [#]gang yin pa/_/de yang re zhig bsngags 'os na/_/ma bcol legs par byed pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' smos ci dgos/_/'gro ba nyung zad nar
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]ma'i zas sbyor ba/_/skad cig zas tsam sbyin par byed pa dang /_/brnyas bcas nyin phyed 'drangs [#]par byed pa yang /_/dge ba byed pa yin zhes skye bos bkur/_/sems can grangs [#]mtha' yas la dus ring du/_/bde bar gshegs kyi bde ba bla na med/_/yid la
[\[3b.2\]]bsam pa mtha' dag rdzogs byed pa/_/rtag tu sbyin pa lta zhig smos ci dgos/_/gang zhig de 'dra'i rgyal sras sbyin bdag la/_/gal te ngan sems skyed par byed na de/_/ngan sems bskyed pa'i grangs bzhin bskal par ni/_/dmyal bar gnas par 'gyur zhes
[\[3b.3\]]thub pas gsungs/_/'on te gang zhig yid rab dang byed na/_/de yi 'bras bu de bas lhag par 'phel/_/rgyal sras rnams la do gal chen pos kyang /_/sdig pa mi 'byung dge ba ngang gis 'phel/_/gang la sems kyi dam pa rin chen de/_/skyes pa de yi
[\[3b.4\]]sku la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/gang la gnod pa byas kyang bde 'brel ba/_/bde ba'i 'byung gnas de la skyabs su mchi/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las byang chub [#]sems kyi phan yon bshad pa zhes bya ba [#]ste le'u dang po'o//_//rin chen
[\[3b.5\]]sems de gzung [#]bar bya ba'i phyir/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang dam pa'i chos/_/dkon mchog dri ma med dang sangs rgyas sras/_/yon tan rgya mtsho rnams la legs par mchod/_/me tog 'bras bu ji snyed yod pa dang /_/sman gyi rnam pa gang zhig [#]yod
[\[3b.6\]]pa dang /_/'jig rten rin chen ji snyed yod pa dang /_/chu gtsang yid du 'ong ba ci yod dang /_/rin chen ri bo dang ni de bzhin du/_/nags tshal sa phyogs dben zhing nyams dga' dang /_/ljon shing me tog rgyan spras spud pa dang /_/shing gang 'bras bzang yal ga
[\[3b.7\]]dud pa dang /_/lha sogs 'jig rten na yang dri dang ni/_/spos dang dpag bsam shing dang rin chen shing /_/ma rmos 'khrungs pa'i lo tog rnam pa dang /_/gzhan yang mchod par 'os pa'i rgyan rnams ni/_/mtsho dang rdzing bu pad+mas brgyan pa dag_/ngang pa shin tu
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]skad snyan yid 'ong ldan/_/nam mkha' rab 'byams [#]khams kyi mthas gtugs na[#]/_/yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa de dag kun/_/blo yis blangs nas thub pa skyes kyi mchog_/sras dang bcas pa rnams la legs 'bul na/_/yon gnas
[\[4a.2\]]dam pa thugs rje che rnams kyis[#]/_/bdag la brtser dgongs bdag gi 'di dag bzhes/_/bdag ni bsod nams mi ldan bkren chen te/_/mchod pa'i nor gzhan bdag la cang ma mchis/_/des na gzhan don dgongs pa'i mgon gyis 'di/_/bdag gi don slad
[\[4a.3\]]nyid kyi mthus bzhes shig_/rgyal dang da sras rnams la bdag gis ni/_/bdag gi lus kun gtan du dbul bar bgyi/_/sems dpa' mchog rnams bdag ni yongs bzhes shig_/gus pas khyed kyi 'bangs su mchi bar bgyi/_/bdag ni khyed kyis yongs su
[\[4a.4\]]bzung bas na/_/srid na mi 'jigs sems can phan pa bgyid[#]/_/sngon gyi sdig las yang dag 'da' bgyid cing /_/sdig pa gzhan yang slan chad mi bgyid do/_/khrus kyi khang pa shin tu dri zhim pa/_/shel gyi sa gzhi gsal zhing 'tsher ba ltar[#]/_/rin chen 'bar
[\[4a.5\]]ba'i ka ba yid 'ong ldan/_/mu tig 'od chags bla re [#]bres pa der/_/de bzhin gshegs dang de yi sras rnams la/_/rin chen bum pa mang po spos kyi chu/_/yid 'ong legs par bkang ba glu dang ni/_/rol mor bcas pa du mas sku khrus gsol/_/de dag sku la mtshungs
[\[4a.6\]]pa med pa'i gos/_/gtsang la dri rab bsgos pas sku phyi'o/_/de nas de la kha dog legs bsgyur ba'i/_/na bza' shin tu dri zhim dam pa 'bul[#]/_/gos bzang srab la 'jam pa sna tshogs dang /_/rgyan mchog brgya phrag de dang de dag gis/_/'phags pa kun du
[\[4a.7\]]bzang dang 'jam dbyangs dang /_/'jig rten dbang phyug sogs la'ang brgyan par bgyi/_/stong gsum kun du dri ngad ldang ba yi/_/dri mchog rnams kyis thub dbang kun gyi sku/_/gser sbyangs btso ma byi dor byas pa ltar/_/'od chags 'bar ba de dag byug par bgyi/_/
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]thub dbang mchod gnas mchog la yid 'ong ba'i/_/me tog man+da ra dang pad+ma dang /_/ut+pal la sogs dri zhim thams cad dang /_/phreng ba spel legs yid 'ong rnams kyis mchod/_/spos mchog yid 'phrog dri ngad khyab pa yi/_/bdug pa'i sprin tshogs rnams
[\[4b.2\]]kyang de la dbul/_/zhal zas bza' btung sna tshogs bcas pa yi/_/lha bshos rnams kyang de la dbul bar bgyi/_/gser gyi pad+ma tshar du dngar ba yi/_/rin chen sgron ma [#]rnams kyang dbul bar bgyi/_/sa gzhi bstar ba spos kyis byugs pa der/_/me
[\[4b.3\]]tog yid 'ong sil ma dgram par bya[#]/_/gzhal med pho brang bstod dbyangs yid 'ong ldan/_/mu tig rin chen rgyan 'phyang mdzes 'bar ba/_/dpag yas nam mkha'i rgyan gyur de dag kyang /_/thugs rje'i rang bzhin can la dbul bar bgyi/_/rin chen
[\[4b.4\]]gdugs mdzes gser gyi yu ba can/_/khor yug rgyan gyi rnam pa yid 'ong ldan/_/dbyibs legs blta [#]na sdug pa bsgreng ba yang /_/rtag tu thub dbang rnams la dbul bar bgyi/_/de las gzhan yang mchod pa'i tshogs/_/rol mo dbyangs snyan yid 'ong ldan/_/
[\[4b.5\]]sems can [(]sngag [,]sdug [)]bsngal tshim byed pa'i/_/sprin rnams so sor gnas gyur cig_/dam chos dkon mchog thams cad dang /_/mchod rten rnams dang sku gzugs la/_/rin chen me tog la sogs char/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par shog/_/ji ltar
[\[4b.6\]]'jam dbyangs la sogs pas/_/rgyal ba rnams la mchod mdzad pa/_/de bzhin bdag gis de bzhin gshegs/_/mgon po sras dang bcas rnams mchod/_/yon tan rgya mtsho rnams la bdag_/bstod dbyangs yan lag rgya mtshos bstod/_/bstod dbyangs
[\[4b.7\]]snyan sprin de dag la/_/nges par kun du 'byung gyur cig_/dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/_/chos dang tshogs kyi mchog bcas la/_/zhing rdul kun gyi grangs snyed kyi/_/lus btud pa yis [#]bdag phyag 'tshal/_/byang chub sems kyi gzhi rnams
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]dang /_/mchod rten rnams la [#]bdag phyag 'tshal/_/mkhan po de bzhin slob dpon dang /_/brtul zhugs mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/_/sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi[#]/_/chos dang byang chub
[\[5a.2\]]sems dpa' yi/_/tshogs la'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi/_/phyogs rnams kun na bzhugs pa yi/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems/_/thugs rje chen po mnga' rnams la/_/thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni/_/thog ma med ldan 'khor ba nas/_/tshe
[\[5a.3\]]rabs 'di 'am gzhan dag tu/_/bdag gis ma 'tshal sdig bgyis pa'am/_/bgyid du stsal ba nyid dang ni/_/gti mug 'khrul pas bdag non te/_/rjes su yid rangs [#]gang bgyis pa/_/nongs pa de ni mthong bgyis nas/_/bsam pa thag pas mgon la
[\[5a.4\]]bshags/_/bdag gis dkon mchog gsum dang ni/_/pha ma'am bla ma gzhan dag la/_/nyon mongs sgo nas lus ngag dang /_/yid kyis gnod bgyis gang lags dang /_/nyes pa du mas [#]skyon chags pa'i/_/sdig can bdag gis sdig pa gang /_/shin
[\[5a.5\]]tu mi bzad bgyis pa de/_/thams cad 'dren pa rnams la bshags[#]/_/bdag ni sdig pa ma byang bar/_/sngon du 'gum par 'gyur du mchi/_/ji ltar 'di las nges thar bar/_/myur ba'i tshul gyis bskyab tu gsol/_/yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/_/
[\[5a.6\]]byas dang ma byas mi sdod pas/_/na dang mi na kun gyis kyang /_/glo bur tshe la yid mi brtan/_/thams cad bor te chas dgos par[#]/_/bdag gis de ltar ma shes nas[#]/_/mdza' dang mi mdza'i [#]don gyi phyir/_/sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/_/mi mdza' rnams
[\[5a.7\]]kyang med 'gyur zhing /_/mdza' ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur/_/bdag kyang med par 'gyur ba ste/_/de bzhin thams cad med par 'gyur/_/rmi lam nyams su myong ba bzhin/_/dngos po gang dang gang spyad pa/_/de de dran pa'i yul du 'gyur/_/'das pa
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]thams cad mthong mi 'gyur/_/re zhig gson tshe 'di nyid la/_/mdza' dang mi mdza' du ma 'das/_/de dag don du byas pa'i sdig_/mi bzad gang yin mdun na gnas/_/de ltar bdag ni glo [#]bur zhes/_/bdag gis rtogs par ma gyur pas/_/gti
[\[5b.2\]]mug chags dang zhe sdang gis/_/sdig pa rnam pa du ma byas/_/nyin mtshan sdod pa yod med par/_/tshe 'di rtag tu god 'gyur zhing /_/snon pa gud nas 'ong med na/_/bdag lta 'chi bar cis mi 'gyur/_/bdag ni mal na 'dug bzhin du/_/gnyen bshes
[\[5b.3\]]kun gyis mtha' bskor kyang [#]/_/srog 'chad pa yi tshor ba dag_/bdag nyid gcig pus myong bar 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i pho nyas zin pa la/_/gnyen gyis ci phan bshes ci phan/_/de tshe bsod nams gcig bskyabs [#]na/_/de yang bdag gis ma bsten to/_/
[\[5b.4\]]mgon po bag med bdag gis ni/_/'jigs pa 'di 'dra ma 'tshal nas/_/mi rtag tshe 'di'i ched dag tu/_/sdig pa mang po nye bar bsgrubs/_/skye bo yan lag bcad pa'i sar/_/di ring khrid pa'ang bred 'gyur te/_/kha skams mig rtsa ngan la sogs/_/snga las
[\[5b.5\]]gzhan du 'gyur snang na/_/gshin rje'i pho nya 'jigs 'jigs lta'i/_/sha tshugs can gyis bzung gyur cing /_/'jigs chen nad kyis thebs gyur pa/_/rab tu nyam thag smos ci dgos/_/su zhig 'jigs chen 'di las bdag_/legs par skyob par byed
[\[5b.6\]]'gyur zhes/_/bred sha thon pa'i mig bgrad nas/_/phyogs bzhir skyabs dag tshol bar byed/_/phyogs bzhir skyabs med mthong nas ni/_/de nas kun du yi mug 'gyur/_/gnas der skyabs yod ma yin na/_/de tshe bdag gis ji ltar bya/_/de bas rgyal ba 'gro ba'i
[\[5b.7\]]mgon/_/'gro ba skyob pa'i don brtson pa/_/stobs chen 'jigs pa kun sel la/_/di ring nyid [#]nas skyabs su mchi/_/de yi thugs su chud pa'i chos/_/'khor ba'i 'jigs pa sel ba dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la yang /_/de bzhin yang dag skyabs
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]su mchi/_/bdag ni 'jigs pas rnam skrag pas[#]/_/kun du bzang la bdag nyid 'bul/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs la [#]bdag nyid kyis/_/bdag gi lus ni dbul bar bgyi/_/thugs rjes spyod pa ma 'khrul ba/_/spyan ras gzigs mgon de la yang /_/
[\[6a.2\]]nyam thag nga ros 'o dod 'bod/_/sdig ldan bdag la bskyab [#]tu gsol/_/'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang /_/sa yi snying po dag dang ni/_/thugs rje che mgon thams cad la/_/skyabs tshol snying nas 'o dod 'bod/_/gang zhig mthong nas [#]gshin rje yi/_/pho nya la
[\[6a.3\]]sogs sdang ba rnams/_/skrag nas phyogs bzhir 'byer byed [#]pa/_/rdo rje can la skyabs su mchi/_/sngon chad khyed kyi bka' las 'das/_/da ni 'jigs pa che mthong nas/_/khyed la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/_/'jigs pa myur du bsal du gsol/_/tha mal
[\[6a.4\]]nad kyis 'jigs na yang /_/sman pa'i ngag bzhin bya dgos na/_/'dod chags la sogs nyes pa brgya'i/_/nad kyis rtag btab smos ci dgos/_/de gcig gis kyang 'dzam gling na/_/gnas pa'i mi kun brlag [#]byed la/_/de dag gso ba'i sman gzhan ni/_/phyogs
[\[6a.5\]]rnams kun nas mi rnyed na/_/de la sman pa thams cad mkhyen/_/zug rngu thams cad 'byin pa yi/_/bka' ltar mi byed sems pa ni/_/shin tu gti mug smad pa'i gnas/_/[#]g.yang sa tha mal chung ngu la'ang /_/bag yod gnas par bya dgos na/_/dpag tshad stong
[\[6a.6\]]du lhung ba yi/_/yun ring g.yang sar smos ci dgos/_/di ring kho na mi 'chi zhes/_/bde bar 'dug pa rigs ma yin/_/bdag ni med par 'gyur ba'i dus/_/de ni gdon mi za bar 'byung /_/bdag la mi 'jigs su yis [#]byin/_/'di las ji ltar nges thar zhes/_/
[\[6a.7\]]gdon mi za bar med 'gyur na/_/ji ltar [#]bdag yid bde bar 'dug_/sngon chad myong ste zhig pa las/_/bdag la lhag pa ci yod na/_/bdag ni de la mngon [#]zhen nas/_/bla ma'i bka' dang 'gal bar byas/_/gson tshe 'di dang de bzhin du/_/gnyen dang bshes pa
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]rnam spangs nas/_/gcig pu ga shed 'gro dgos na/_/mdza' dang mi mdza' kun ci rung /_/mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung /_/de las ji ltar nges thar zhes/_/nyin mtshan rtag tu bdag gis ni/_/'di nyid 'ba' zhig bsam pa'i rigs/_/bdag ni mi shes
[\[6b.2\]]gti mug pas/_/rang bzhin kha na ma tho'am[#]/_/bcas pa'i sdig pa gang yin las/_/gang yang rung ba bgyis pa rnams/_/mgon po'i spyan sngar mngon sum du/_/thal sbyar sdug bsngal 'jigs sems kyis/_/yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te/_/de dag thams
[\[6b.3\]]cad bshags par bgyi/_/'dren pa rnams kyis bdag gi sdig_/nongs pa lags par gzung du gsol/_/'di ni bzang po ma lags pas/_/slan chad bdag ni yong mi bgyid/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/_sdig pa bshags pa'i le'u
[\[6b.4\]]ste gnyis pa'o//_//sems can kun gyi ngan song gi_/sdug bsngal ngal so'i dge ba dang /_/sdug bsngal can dag bder gnas la/_/dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub rgyur gyur dge bsags pa/_/de la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/lus
[\[6b.5\]]can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las/_/nges par thar la yi rang ngo /_/skyob pa rnams kyi byang chub dang /_/rgyal sras sa la'ang yi rang ngo /_/sems can thams cad bde mdzad pa'i/_/thugs bskyed dge ba rgya mtsho dang /_/sems can phan pa [#]mdzad pa la/_/dga' bas
[\[6b.6\]]rjes su yi rang ngo /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi sangs rgyas la/_/thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni/_/sems can sdug bsngal mun 'thoms la/_/chos kyi sgron ma [#]spar du gsol/_/rgyal ba mya ngan 'da' bzhed la/_/thal mo sbyar te gsol ba ni/_/'gro 'di ldongs par
[\[6b.7\]]mi dgod cing /_/bskal pa grangs med bzhugs par gsol/_/de ltar 'di dag kun byas te/_/dge ba bdag gis bsags pa gang /_/des ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/sdug bsngal thams cad bsal bar shog_/'gro ba nad pa ji srid du/_/nad sos gyur gyi
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bar du ni/_/sman dang sman pa nyid dag dang /_/de yi nad g.yog byed par shog_/zas dang skom gyi char phab ste/_/bkres dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal [#]bsal/_/mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma'i tshe/_/bdag ni zas dang skom du gyur/_/sems

[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]kyis ni/_/brtson 'grus spel phyir 'bad par bya/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi nyes pa ni/_/dpag med bdag gis gzhom bya ste/_/gang du nyes pa re re la'ang /_/bskal pa rgya mtsho [#]zad 'gyur ba/_/nyes zad rtsom pa de yi ni/_/cha yang bdag la ma mthong na/_/
[\[21b.2\]]sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa'i gnas[#]/_/bdag go ci phyir [#]snying ma gas/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi [#]yon tan ni/_/mang po bdag gis bsgrub bya ste/_/de la yon tan re re yang /_/bskal pa rgya mtshos goms 'gyur [#]na/_/bdag ni [#]yon tan cha la yang /_/goms
[\[21b.3\]]pa nam yang ma skyes te/_/ji zhig ltar rnyed skye ba ni[#]/_/bdag gis don med byas pa mtshar[#]/_/bdag gis bcom ldan ma mchod cing /_/dga' ston chen po'i bde ma byin/_/bstan la bya ba ma byas dang /_/dbul po'i bsam pa rdzogs ma byas/_/'jigs
[\[21b.4\]]la mi 'jigs ma byin dang /_/nyam thag bde ma byin [#]na bdag_/ma yi mngal gyi zug rngu dang /_/sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig bskyed par zad/_/bdag ni sngon dang da [#]ltar yang /_/chos la mos dang bral ba yis/_/phongs pa 'di 'dra byung bar gyur[#]/_/su zhig chos la
[\[21b.5\]]mos pa gtong /_/dge ba'i phyogs ni thams cad kyi[#]/_/rtsa ba mos par [#]thub pas gsungs/_/de yi [#]rtsa ba rtag tu ni/_/rnam smin 'bras bu bsgoms [#]pas so/_/sdug bsngal yid mi bde ba dang /_/'jigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'dod pa rnams dang bral [# ]

[\[21b.7\]]'gyur ba/_/de dang der ni sdig pa des/_/sdug bsngal mtshon gyis rnam par 'joms/_/rgya che dri bzang bsil ba'i pad+ma'i snying por gnas/_/rgyal ba'i gsung snyan zas kyis gzi brjid bskyed byas pa/_/thub 'od kyis [#]rgyas pad+ma las byung lus mchog can/_/

[\[22a.1\]]rgyal ba'i mdun gnas bde gshegs sras su dge bas 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i skyes bus pags [#]pa ma lus bshus pas shin tu nyam thag cing /_/rab tu tsha ba'i me yis bzhus pa'i zangs zhun lus la blugs gyur la/_/'bar ba'i ral

[\[22a.3\]]par bya/_/dang por [#]'byor pa brtags [#]nas ni/_/brtsam mam [#]yang na mi brtsam bya/_/ma brtsams pa ni mchog yin gyi/_/brtsams nas ldog par mi bya'o/_/skye ba gzhan du de goms shing /_/sdig dang sdug bsngal 'phel bar [#]'gyur/_/gzhan dang 'bras
[\[22a.4\]]bu'i dus kyang ni/_/dman 'gyur de yang sgrub [#]mi 'gyur/_/las dang nyon mongs nus pas te[#]/_/gsum po dag la nga rgyal bya/_/bdag nyid gcig pus bya'o zhes/_/'di ni las kyi nga rgyal nyid/_/nyon mongs dbang med 'jig rten 'dis/_/rang don sgrub [# ]
[\[22a.5\]]par mi nus pas/_/'gro bas bdag ltar mi nus te/_/de bas bdag gis 'di bya'o/_/gzhan dag dman pa'i las byed na/_/bdag nyid kyang ni ji ltar 'dug_/nga rgyal gyis ni mi byas te[#]/_/bdag la nga rgyal med pa mchog_/shi ba'i sbrul dang phrad gyur na/_/

[\[22b.1\]]'di la gnas par bya/_/'gro gang nga rgyal gyis bcom de/_/nyon mongs nga rgyal can ma yin/_/nga rgyal can dgra'i dbang mi 'gro/_/de dag nga rgyal dgra dbang 'gyur[#]/_/nyon mongs nga rgyal gyis khengs ni[#]/_/ngan 'gror nga [#]rgyal gyis khrid cing [#]/_/mi yi

[\[22b.6\]]ba'i [#]las gang yin/_/las de la ni zhen bya ste/_/las des mi ngoms dga' bar bya/_/bde ba'i don du las byas kyang /_/bde 'gyur mi 'gyur gtol med kyi/_/gang gi las nyid bde 'gyur ba/_/de las mi byed ji ltar bde/_/spu gri'i sor chags sbrang rtsi

[\[25a.1\]]pa gcig pu [#]yis/_/sems ni mnyam par gzhag phyir dang /_/dul bar bya phyir brtson te [#]bya/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du'ang /_/'dod pa rnams ni phung khrol bskyed/_/'dir [#]ni bsad dang bcing dang gcod/_/pha rol du ni dmyal sogs

[\[25a.6\]]mthong nas ni/_/mi 'gul yang ni khyod skrag na/_/ro langs bzhin du 'ga' yis kyang /_/bskyod par gyur na cis mi 'jigs/_/gang la g.yogs kyang 'di chags pa/_/de ma g.yogs na cis [#]mi 'dod/_/de la dgos pa med na ni/_/g.yogs pa la ni ci phyir
[\[25a.7\]]'khyud/_/zas ni gcig pu nyid las ni/_/bshang dang kha chu byung gyur na/_/de las [#]bshang la mi dga' zhing /_/kha chu la khyod ci phyir dga'/_/shing bal reg na 'jam pa yi/_/sngas la dga' bar mi byed par/_/dri nga 'dzag pa ma yin zhes/_/'dod ldan mi gtsang

[\[25b.1\]]ba la rmongs/_/'dod ldan ngan pa rmongs pa rnams/_/shing bal reg na 'jam pa la'ang [#]/_/nyal po bya bar mi nus zhes/_/de la khro ba dag tu byed/_/gal te mi gtsang chags med na/_/rus gzeb [#]rgyus pas sbrel ba la/_/sha yi 'dam gyis zhal zhal byas/_/

[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]gtsang gzhan yang blta bar gyis/_/gang las pags pa'i kha phye na/_/'jigs pa chen po skye 'gyur bar/_/shes kyang ji ltar de nyid la/_/phyir zhing dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/lus la bskus pa'i dri de yang /_/tsan+dan sogs yin gzhan [# ]

[\[26a.3\]]ci zhig byung [#]/_/gzhan gyi dri yis gzhan dag la/_/ci yi phyir na chags par byed/_/gal te skra sen ring ba dang /_/so skya drir bcas 'dam gyi dris/_/bsgos pas lus kyi rang bzhin ni/_/gcer bu 'jigs pa nyid yin na/_/[#]rang la gnod pa'i mtshon bzhin du[#]/_/

[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de yi [#]phyir na sdug bsngal dag_/zhi bar 'dod pas shes rab bskyed/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam ste/_/'di ni bden pa gnyis su 'dod/_/don dam blo yi spyod yul min/_/blo ni kun rdzob yin par brjod/_/de la 'jig rten rnam gnyis
[\[31a.2\]]mthong /_/rnal 'byor pa dang phal pa'o/_/de la 'jig rten phal pa ni/_/rnal 'byor 'jig rten gyis gnod [#]cing /_/rnal 'byor pa yang blo khyad kyis/_/gong ma gong ma rnams kyis gnod/_/gnyi ga yang ni 'dod pa'i dpes/_/'bras bu'i don du ma dpyad phyir/_
[\[31a.3\]]'jig rten pa yis dngos mthong zhing /_/yang dag nyid du'ang rtog byed kyi/_/sgyu ma lta bur min pas 'dir/_/rnal 'byor pa dang 'jig rten rtsod/_/gzugs sogs mngon sum nyid kyang ni/_/grags pas yin gyi tshad mas min/_/de ni mi gtsang la sogs la/_/gtsang
[\[31a.4\]]sogs grags pa bzhin du brdzun/_/'jig rten gzhug [#]pa'i don du ni/_/mgon pos dngos bstan de nyid du/_/de dag skad cig ma nyid min/_/kun rdzob tu yang 'gal zhe na/_/rnal 'byor kun rdzob nyes med de/_/'jig rten la ltos de nyid mthong /_/gzhan du bud med mi
[\[31a.5\]]gtsang bar/_/nges rtog 'jig rten gyis gnod 'gyur/_/sgyu 'dra'i rgyal las bsod nams ni/_/ji ltar dngos yod la ji bzhin/_/gal te sems can sgyu 'dra na/_/shi nas ji ltar skye zhe na/_/ji srid rkyen rnams 'tshogs [#]gyur pa/_/de srid sgyu ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/

[\[31a.7\]]sems ni 'byung ba med/_/sna tshogs rkyen las byung ba yi/_/sgyu ma de yang sna tshogs nyid/_/rkyen gcig gis ni kun nus pa/_/gang na yang ni yod ma yin/_/gal te don dam mya ngan 'das/_/'khor ba kun rdzob de lta na/_/sangs rgyas kyang ni 'khor 'gyur bas/_/byang chub

[\[31b.1\]]spyod pas ci zhig bya/_/rkyen rnams rgyun ni ma chad na/_/sgyu ma'ang ldog par mi 'gyur gyi/_/rkyen rnams rgyun ni chad pas [#]na/_/kun rdzob tu yang mi 'byung ngo /_/gang tshe 'khrul pa'ang yod min na/_/sgyu ma gang gis dmigs par 'gyur/_/gang tshe khyod la sgyu ma nyid/_/med

[\[32a.1\]]gzhan du mkha' 'drar 'gyur/_/dngos med dngos la brten pas na/_/byed dang ldan par ji ltar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi sems ni grogs med pa[#]/_/gcig pu nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/gang tshe sems ni gzung bral ba[#]/_/de tshe thams cad de bzhin gshegs/_/de lta na yang

[\[32b.1\]]theg chen ma grub na/_/khyod kyi lung ni ji ltar grub/_/gang phyir gnyis ka la 'di grub/_/dang po [#]khyod la 'di ma grub/_/rkyen gang gis ni der yid ches/_/de ni theg chen la yang mtshungs/_/gzhan gnyis 'dod pas bden na ni[#]/_/rig byed sogs kyang bden par 'gyur/_/

[\[35b.1\]]dbye bas bskyed pa yin/_/rgyu dbye gang gis byas zhe [#]na/_/sngar gyi rgyu dbye nyid las so/_/ci phyir rgyu yis 'bras skyed nus[#]/_/sngar gyi rgyu yi mthu nyid las/_/dbang phyug 'gro ba'i rgyu yin na/_/re zhig dbang phyug gang yin smros/_/'byung rnams zhe na de lta

[\[46a.1\]]byin gyis rlob par mdzad cing /_skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i gnas skabs su btang snyoms kyis bzhugs so/_/de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis ci zhig ltar na rnyed par dka' ba 'byung ba'i phyir 'jig rten te/_skye bo'i bsod nams phan pa dang bde ba'i rgyu
[\[46a.2\]]dge ba'i las rnams la blo gros yud tsam zhig 'byung ste/_de ni der mi brten pa'i phyir dang /_'khor ba thog ma med par 'jig rten gyi mi dge ba'i phyogs nyid la goms pa'i phyir ro/_/des cir 'gyur zhe na/_de ltas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_gang gi phyir de lta bas na dge ba ste/_
[\[46a.3\]]bsod nams nyam chung ba dang stobs dang bral ba nyid glog 'gyu ba dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/rtag ces bya ba ni dus thams cad du shin tu nyam chung ba yin no/_/de lta na gang la shin tu stobs che ba yod ce na/_sdig pa stobs chen zhes gsungs pa la/_stobs chen ni yang mi dge ba chen po yin
[\[46a.4\]]te/_phyi'i sprin rum gyi mun pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i mi bzod pa ni shin tu 'jigs par byed pa ste/_dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'i phyir dang /_thub par dka' ba'i phyir ro/_/de ltar 'di la nus pa chen po yod du chug kyang de lta na yang de las gzhan bsod
[\[46a.5\]]nams stobs dang ldan pas rgyal bar byed par 'gyur te/_de ltar yang cung zad kyang nyams pa med do zhe na/_de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_nus pa chen po dang ldan pa de lta bu de ni gzhan gang gis te/_cig shos bsod nams kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur zhing rgyal bar 'gyur te/_
[\[46a.6\]]gzhan gang gis kyang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang ci'i phyir 'di ltar brjod ce na/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa la/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste sangs rgyas nyid la sems can thams cad yang dag par gdon pa'i bsam pas de thob par bya ba'i don du lhag pa'i
[\[46a.7\]]bsam pa sems gang zhig yid la byed pa ste/_gal te de med par gyur na'o/_/nus pa chen po yang de las gzhan stobs che bas rgyal bar byed de/_mtshan mo'i mun pa la nyi mas byed pa bzhin du/_byang chub kyi sems las gzhan gnyen po chen po srid pa yang ma yin no/_/de lta
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]bas na de gzhom pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems nyid blang bar bya ste/_gzhan ni ma yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/byang chub kyi sems blang bar bya ba yin no zhes bskal pa zhes pa la sogs pa 'dis kyang gsungs te/_bar gyi bskal pa gcig kyang bskal pa yin la/_bar gyi
[\[46b.2\]]bskal pa nyi shu yang bskal pa yin zhing /_bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu yang bskal pa yin te/_de la yang bskal pa chen po zhes brjod la/_'di ni bskal pa chen po nyid du gzung ngo /_/bskal pa mang por te bskal pa grangs med pa dang po'i khongs su gtogs pa rnams so/_/rab dgongs mdzad
[\[46b.3\]]pa ni 'bad pas sems par mdzad pa rnams kyis te/_gzigs pa ni rtogs pa'o/_/thub dbang rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis so/_/phan pa'i don thams cad grub par rung ba yin te/_de'i sa bon du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/'di nyid ni byang chub kyi sems nyid do/_/
[\[46b.4\]]ci'i phyir 'di kho na phan pa yin zhe na/_gang phyir zhes gsungs te/_gang gi phyir bde 'phel ni phul du byung ba ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid do/_/tshad med ni gzhal du med pa yin la/_skye bo'i tshogs ni sems can gyi phung po'o/_/thob par byed pa ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mtsho las sgrol
[\[46b.5\]]bar byed pa'o/_/de'i phyir na 'di nyid phan pa'o/_/yang na gang gi phyir bde ba ni lha dang mi'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin la/_'phel ba ni 'phel bar gyur pa ste don gyis na byang chub kyi sems nyid do/_/thob par byed pa ni shin tu tshim par byed pa ste bya sla bas ches lhag par
[\[46b.6\]]gang 'gyur ba de la 'thob par byed pa zhes brjod de/_dper na zhos bdag tshim par byas so zhes bya ba lta bu ste/_zhos ches lhag par sla bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang na rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems gang las bde ba 'phel ba yin no zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o/_/ci'i phyir rab tu
[\[46b.7\]]'phel zhe na/_bde blag nyid du zhes gsungs te/_tshegs med par yin te skra 'bal ba la sogs pa'i dka' ba chen po med pas so/_/'di ltar yang byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa rnams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pas lha dang mi
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'phel ba bde blag tu 'thob cing sems can rnams la ches lhag par tshim par byed pa yin te/_de ltar skyo ngal kun bsal ba'i/_/byang sems shing rta zhon nas ni/_/bde nas bde ru 'gro ba la/_/sems shes su zhig
[\[47a.2\]]sgyid lug 'gyur/_/zhes gang 'chad par 'gyur ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa byams pa'i stobs la sogs pa skyes pa'i rabs rnams su dka' ba chen po mdzad pa thos pa ma yin nam/_de ci ltar na bde blag nyid du bde ba 'phel bar byed ce na/_nyes pa 'di ni med de gang gi phyir
[\[47a.3\]]snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams kyi gzhan la phan pa dang bde ba skyed par byed pa'i sdug bsngal ni rang dang gzhan la bskyed par bya'o/_/pha rol sdug bsngal bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i blo can rnams ni sdug bsngal de 'dra ba la bde ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rang dang gzhan la phan pa'i
[\[47a.4\]]rgyu nyid yin pa 'di'i phyir yang byang chub kyi sems yongs su gtong bar mi bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_srid pa'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_'khor bar gnas pa'i dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bde ba ma yin pa myong ba rnams yin la/_brgya
[\[47a.5\]]phrag ni mthar thug pa med pa'i tshogs so/_/gzhom 'dod pa ni yongs su 'dor bar 'dod pas de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnams kyis so/_/bdag nyid 'ba' zhig gi ma yin par 'jig rten pa rnams kyi skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang bsal bar 'dod
[\[47a.6\]]pa ni bral bar 'dod pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnams kyis so/_/gcig tu rang dang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bsal bar 'dod pa ma yin gyi/_gzhan yang bde ba dang skyid pa mang po ste/_de rnams kyi brgya phrag ni lha dang mi rnams kyi skye ba 'thob pa nyams su myong bar 'dod pa ste/_
[\[47a.7\]]'khor ba'i bde ba 'dod pas kyang ngo /_/rtag tu ni dus thams cad du'o/_/gtang mi bya ba ste/_byang chub kyi sems khas blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang na rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa rnams nyid kyi khyad par dag go/_/yon tan gyi khyad par 'di las kyang byang chub kyi
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]sems gzung bar bya'o zhes bya bar 'khor ba'i btson ra zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_'khor ba nyid btson ra yin la/_der bsdams pa ni 'ching ba dag ste/_'dir 'dod chags la sogs pa nyid yin no zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro/_/de lta bu'i nyam thag rnams ni nyon mongs pa
[\[47b.2\]]rnams so/_/bskyed gyur pa ni dang po nyid du byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa len pas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa pa nyid na'o/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi sras zhes brjod bya zhing /_/zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sras zhes brjod par bya'o/_/skad cig gis zhes pa ni skad cig de nyid la'o/_/
[\[47b.3\]]'di 'ba' zhig ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'jig rten lha mir bcas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_lha mir te/_lha dang mi dang lhan cig par gyur pa yin la/_gang lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten la sogs pa de rnams kyi yang phyag byar gyur pa ste/_phyag bya ba'i 'os dang bstod par bya ba'i 'os
[\[47b.4\]]su yang gyur pa'o/_/gyur pa'i sgras ni 'das pa bsal bar byed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems skyes pa'i dus nyid na gyur pa yin no/_/yon tan dang phan yon mthong ba 'di las kyang byang chub kyi sems blang ba la 'bad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni/_mi gtsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa
[\[47b.5\]]gsungs te/_mi gtsang ba'i lus 'di ni mi la sogs pa'i lus kyi rang bzhin de'i rgyu'am de'i ngo bo yin te/_des bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de blangs nas ni bzung nas so/_/rgyal ba nyid rin chen te/_rnyed dka' ba thob pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/byang
[\[47b.6\]]chub kyi sems kyis de'i skur bsgyur ba ni skyed par byed pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur rdzogs par byed ces pa'i don to/_/ci lta bur gyur pa zhig yin zhe na/_rin thang med pa ste/_gang la rin thang med pa de la de skad ces brjod de/_khams gsum po thams cad yon tan mchog
[\[47b.7\]]tu gyur pa dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /_yon tan gyi mtha' mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/de nyid kyi phyir gser sgyur rtsi'i rnam pa ste/_shin tu cher sgyur bar byed pa'i phyir mchog tu sgyur ba'o/_/de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems 'di la gser sgyur rtsi'i rnam pa lta bu dang gzhan byang chub kyi sems
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]zhes brjod do/_/rab brtan gzung ni ci ltar blangs pa de slar g.yo ba med par ro/_/de lta bas na bdag nyid rgyal ba rin po cher byed par 'dod pas byang chub kyi sems kyi gser sgyur rtsi chen po lta bur rab tu bstan par gzung bar bya'o/_/de yang byams pa'i
[\[48a.2\]]rnam par thar pa las rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dngul chu'i rigs gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de srang gcig gis kyang lcags srang stong gser du bsgyur ro/_/dngul chu srang gcig po de ni lcags srang stong po des zad par bya ba'am/_lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/_/
[\[48a.3\]]de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bcud kyis len dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su gzung ba ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te/_chos thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i gser gyi kha dog tu byed
[\[48a.4\]]kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bskyed pa'i bcud kyis len gcig po de ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i lcags thams cad kyis kyang nyon mongs pa'am zad par bya bar mi nus so zhes gsungs so/_/srid pa'i 'gro ba rnams su 'byor pa 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang 'dir the tshom dang phyin ci log
[\[48a.5\]]mi bya'o zhes nye bar bstan pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i ded dpon zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_'gro ba nyid tshang rdal te/_zong gi rdzas nyo ba dang 'tshong ba'i grong khyer ni 'dir tshong rdal yin la/_de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis zong gi rdzas nyo ba dang 'tshong ba'i gnas ni 'gro
[\[48a.6\]]ba'i tshong rdal lo/_/de rnams su gnas pa ni rnam par gnas pa nyid kyi ngang tshul gyi rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces brjod de/_kye 'gro ba'i tshong rdal du gnas pa'i ngang tshul can rnams/_rin chen byang chub sems legs brtan par zung /_/zhes de rnams la 'bod pa
[\[48a.7\]]yin no/_/byang chub kyi sems nyid rin chen te/_rin po che lta bu'o/_/dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches dbul ba'i ngan 'gro zhi bar byed pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems rin po che 'di yang yin no/_/dgos pa ni khyed cag tshong pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]tshogs pa thob pa don du gnyer ba yin pas rin po che 'di nyid gus pa chen pos zung shig ces bya ba 'di yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_rin che bas zhes te/_'di ni gtan tshigs kyi tshig yin te/_gang gi phyir 'di ni rin thang med pa thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
[\[48b.2\]]las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir 'di nyid gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di ci ltar shes na/_legs par yongs su brtags na zhes gsungs te/_shin tu nges par brtags shing yang dag par gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/gang
[\[48b.3\]]dag gis she na/_tshad med blos te/_tshad med cing gzhal bar mi nus pa'i blo dang blo gros gang la yod pa de dag gis te/_shes rab chen po dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis so/_/de dag gis yongs su brtags pa las 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir/_
[\[48b.4\]]legs par yongs su brtags na zhes gsungs so/_/yang ji lta bur gyur pa zhig gis she na/_'gro ba'i ded dpon gcig pu ste/_'gro ba na thugs rje'i dbang du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni ded dpon gcig pu nyid de de dag gis so/_/
[\[48b.5\]]dper na tshong pa rnams la phan pa dang mi phan pa thob pa dang spong ba dag la phan par 'dod pa dang shes pa dang ldan pa'i ded dpon gyis khrid par byed par gyur na des slu bar byed pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du 'dir yang yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/de'i phyir byang chub kyi sems rin po che rin thang
[\[48b.6\]]med pa brten par zung shig ces pa'o/_/'di yang de nyid du/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_ji srid du nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa de srid du nor dang /_'bru dang /_rin po che dang /_sa le sbram dang /_dngul dang /_me tog dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa
[\[48b.7\]]dang /_gos dang /_longs spyod gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi bzod do/_/de bzhin du ji srid du dus gsum du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi yul snang bar mdzad pa de srid du lha dang mi'i sems can
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dbang gi rgyal po'i rin du mi chog go zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[49a.2\]]mchog tu thun mong ma yin pa phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_dge ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_ji ltar chu shing lan cig 'bras bu bskyed nas yang 'bras bu mi skyed pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las gzhan pa'i
[\[49a.3\]]dge ba kun ni cung zad kyang ma yin pa nyid do/_/rnam par smin pa yongs su smin nas yang 'bras bu bskyed pa'i nus pa med pa yin te/_de tsam nyid kyis 'di'i rnam par smin pa zad pa'i phyir dang /_rnam par smin pa yang lung du bstan du med pas yang 'bras bu dang rjes su 'brel pa med
[\[49a.4\]]pa'i phyir ro//_//bam po gnyis pa/_yang byang chub kyi sems 'di'i khyad par rtag par yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_rtag par dus thams cad du de las gzhan pa'i dge ba bzhin du lha dang mir skyes pa rnams la bde ba phun sum tshogs pa byung nas zad
[\[49a.5\]]par 'gyur ba ma yin te/_brtan pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang /_skad cig so so la dge ba'i tshogs kyi rgyun rnam pa du mas 'gengs pa'i phyir ro/_/'byin pas 'phel ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ljon shing ste/_rgyun mi 'chad par bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bu
[\[49a.6\]]'byin pa'i phyir dang /_gong nas gong du yon tan gzhan dang gzhan gyi khyad par skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub kyi sems ni ljon shing lta bur dper byas pa yin te/_skyes bu rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig bsdus pa lta bu'o/_/gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir rgyun mi
[\[49a.7\]]'chad cing phul du byung ba dang ldan pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'dod pa'i rtog pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis 'di nyid gzung bar bya'o/_/'di yang blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa las/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rgya mtsho chen por chu'i thig
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]pa lhung ba ni bskal pa'i mthar ma thug gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad pa'am gtugs pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad pa'am gtugs pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/yang
[\[49b.2\]]byang chub kyi sems ni dge ba ma lus pa 'phel bar byed pa 'ba' zhig ni ma yin te/_mi dge ba'i phyogs zad par byed pa'i rgyu yang yin par tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gnyis kyis bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/sdig pa shin tu zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_byang chub kyi sems
[\[49b.3\]]yongs su bzung ba las sngar byas pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams ni dmyal ba la sogs pa rnams su bzod par dka' ba'i sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa'i phyir mi bzad pa rnams te/_shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'am chen po rnams so/_/byang chub kyi sems gang la brten
[\[49b.4\]]nas te/_brten par byas pa ni bskyed pa dang bsrung ba dang /_spel ba dang /_brten pa'i mtshan nyid las so/_/yud kyis ni skad cig ma nyid la de bskyed pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po chen po nye bar stsogs pa'i phyir ro/_/sgrol 'gyur ba ni nges par sgrol bar 'gyur ba ste/_
[\[49b.5\]]de'i mthus zil gyis mnan cing 'da' bar byed pas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ji ltar zhe na/_dpa' la brten nas 'jigs pa chen po ltar te/_dper na kha cig gis gnod pa chen po byas pa yang skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa la brten nas sgrol bar 'gyur te/_de gnod pa byas pa'i 'bras bus
[\[49b.6\]]'jigs pa med par 'gyur ba de bzhin du skabs su bab pa la yang ngo /_/byang chub kyi sems de lta bur gyur pa de la mi shes pa'i sems can shes rab dang bral ba rmongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyis ci ltar na mi brten cing rten par mi byed ces bya ba'i don te de la brten par bya ba nyid yin no
[\[49b.7\]]snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/'di yang de nyid las rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu dpa' bo la yang dag par brten pa na dgra bo thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skyes bu dpa' bo la yang dag par brten pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]ni nyes par spyod pa'i dgra bo thams cad kyis mi 'jigs so zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems kyis sdig pa zad pa'i dpe gzhan yang des ni dus mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la/_dus mtha' ni 'jig pa'i dus so/_/me ni nyi ma
[\[50a.2\]]bdun shar ba las byung ba'o/_/dper na bsam gtan dang po dang bcas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad nges par bsregs te ma lus par nges par bsregs pa na ji ltar thal ba yang lus pa med pa de bzhin du sdig pa rnams so/_/ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na/_byang chub kyi
[\[50a.3\]]sems gang gis chen po ri rab dang mnyam pa ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par smin pa rnams nges par sreg par byed de/_de'i rnam par smin pa nye bar 'joms pas rtsa ba nas med par byed do/_/skad cig gis ni yun mi ring bas so/_/de la mi shes sems
[\[50a.4\]]can rnams kyis cis mi bsten/_/zhes sbyar bar bya'o/_/'di yang de nyid las nyes par byas pa thams cad sreg par byed pas sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me lta bu'o/_/mi dge ba'i chos thams cad nub par byed pas sa 'og lta bu'o zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis las
[\[50a.5\]]byas pa chud mi za bar gsungs pa ma yin nam/_de ji ltar na 'di skad du brjod ce na/_bden mod kyi brjod par bya'o/_/byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs skad cig so so la nam mkha'i khams khyab par byed pa chen po'i nang du chud par gyur pas rgya mtshor
[\[50a.6\]]lan tshwa srang gcig gi dpe bzhin du mi mngon pa'i phyir dang /_gnyen po'i phyogs stobs dang ldan pas zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir 'bras bu skyed pa'i nus pa med pa de bsregs pa nyid yin pas nyes pa med do/_/yang na ma spyad par ni zad ces bya ba ni thabs med pa la dgongs
[\[50a.7\]]nas gsungs pa yin la/_'di ni sdig pa thams cad rtsa ba nas med par byed pa'i thabs chen po yin no/_/'di ltar yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i sems can thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las bton te/_bde ba phun sum
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]tshogs pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par sems par byed cing sngar byas pa'i sdig pa yang rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pas zad par byed do/_/de'i tshe byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs nyid kyis de'i rgyud la sdig pa ji ltar 'byung zhing /_gang gis
[\[50b.2\]]na rtsod pa'i skabs yod par 'gyur te/_thams cad du 'khrugs pa med do/_/de lta bas na/_dge gzhan gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa de yang gsal bar byas pa yin no/_/yang gzhan ni rnam par smin pa ma nges pa la dgongs nas 'di dag thams
[\[50b.3\]]cad gsungs pa yin te/_rnam par smin pa nges pa ni las gang gis kyang dgag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do/_/'di ltar yang byang chub kyi sems blang bar bya ba nyid du gang gis zhes gsungs te/_byang chub kyi sems gang gi phan yon ni ngo bo nyid du gyur pa'i yon tan
[\[50b.4\]]no/_/dpag tu med pa ni gzhal du med pa'o/_/byams mgon ni bcom ldan 'das mi pham pas so/_/ji lta bur gyur pa zhig ce na/_blo dang ldan pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa'o/_/bshad pa ni gsungs par gyur pa'o/_/gang zhig la zhe na/_nor bzangs la ste/_byang chub
[\[50b.5\]]sems dpa' nor bzangs la'o/_/de ltar yang sdong po bkod pa las/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi dkar po'i chos rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad
[\[50b.6\]]brtan pas sa lta bu'o zhes bya ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su bsrung bas pha lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i bar du yang bsgre'o/_/dbul ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pas rnam thos kyi bu lta bu'o/_/don thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pas yid bzhin
[\[50b.7\]]gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra pham par bya ba la mdung thung lta bu'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so/_/de la mi shes sems can cis mi brten/_/zhes
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa ni 'dir yang sbyar ro/_/da ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub kyi sems de zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_de zhes pa ni phan yon bstan ma thag pa'i byang chub kyi sems so/_/gnyis ni rnam pa gnyis te/_shes
[\[51a.2\]]bya ni go bar bya ba'o/_/rigs dang sa la sogs par gyur pas rnam pa du ma srid na/_ji ltar gnyis yin zhe na/_mdor bsdus nas zhes gsungs te/_rnam pa gzhan yod na yang 'di ni mdor bsdus nas gnyis su brjod do/_/gnyis po gang yin zhe na/_byang chub smon pa'i sems shes pa ni
[\[51a.3\]]gcig yin la/_byang chub 'jug pa zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o/_/byang chub la smon pa yin te/_sems de nyid dam de la sems pa'o/_/sems gang smon pa las skyes par gyur pa sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa bral ba de ni smon pa byang chub kyi sems te/_'di ltar 'gro ba thams
[\[51a.4\]]cad bskyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces dang po kho nar smon pa'i sems lta bu'o/_/'jug pa nyid la sems pa'am 'jug pa nyid kyi sems te/_sems de'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sems snga ma sngon du song ba nyid gang nas bzung ste sdom pa len pa sngon du 'gro ba'i
[\[51a.5\]]tshogs rnams la rab tu 'jug pa de ni 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems so/_/bstan pa'i rim pas rnam pa gnyis yin te/_dbye ba ni de dag kho na'o zhes bya ba nyid kyi sgras bstan to/_/kyang gi sgras phan tshun sdud pa yin te/_gnyi ga yang byang chub kyi sems yin par bstan to/_/des
[\[51a.6\]]ni snga ma byang chub kyi sems ma yin no snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba yin te/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo las/_btsan thabs su byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du sdong po bkod pa las/_rigs kyi bu sems can gyi
[\[51a.7\]]'jig rten na sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems smon pa de dag kyang dkon no/_/de bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'jug pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon no zhes gsungs so/_/da ni rab tu dbye
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]ba bstan pa nyid dpes gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_'gro bar 'dod dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i yul du phyin par bya ba'i ched du 'gro bar 'dod pa ni 'gro bar bsam pa ste 'gro ba nyid ma yin no/_/yang gzhan ni der

[\[51b.3\]]ba'o/_/mkhas pas shes pa ni shes pas so/_/ji ltar zhe na/_rim bzhin te/_sngar gyis smon pa byang chub kyi sems bstan pa dang /_phyis kyis 'jug pa'i sems zhes pa ni rim bzhin zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de la smon pa byang chub kyi sems 'di sgrub pa dang bral yang 'khor bar
[\[51b.4\]]'bras bu chen po 'byung bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yin no zhes pa ni byang chub smon pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_da sgrub pa dang bral ba yin du chug mod kyi/_de lta na'ang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyu nyid du re zhig gzhag ste/_dge ba gzhan las chen po yin
[\[51b.5\]]par rtag par yang 'bras bu 'byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar yang byams pa'i rnam par thar pa las/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang gser gyi rgyan khyad par du 'phags pa thams cad zil gyis gnon
[\[51b.6\]]cing rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi 'dor la/_dbul ba thams cad kyang rnam par bzlog go/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che nan tan dang bral bas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi gser gyi rgyan thams cad zil

[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ba ma yin te/_'di ltar thabs yongs su bzung bas 'bras bu chen po nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de yang ji skad du/_'phags pa rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod bya ba mang ba/_byed pa

[\[52a.3\]]dang /_don du gnyer ba dang /_smon pa 'gro yang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_nyal yang rung /_sad kyang rung /_za yang rung /_'thung yang rung /_rtag par rgyun du dran par gyis la yid la zung ste sgoms shig/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan

[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]shing /_len du mar mi'i nang du skyes te/_lha dang mi thams cad du skyes pa na dbang po byed par gyur kyang da dung zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa yin no/_/des na spyod pa dang bral ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyang brnyes par mi bya ste/_des kyang 'khor ba'i bde ba mtha'

[\[53a.1\]]tsam mo/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas sgrub pa snying por gyur par bya'o/_/'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/_de lta bas na gzhon nu khyod kyis sgrub pa snying por gyur pa la bslab par bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhon nu sgrub pa snying por byed pa la

[\[53a.6\]]kyi theg pa la sems skyed par byed de/_de bzlog pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thad pa gsungs so/_/'thad pa de nyid tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis bstan pa'i phyir/_sems can zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_sngags sam sman gyis skye bo nyung zad kyi glad pa'i nad tsam

[\[53b.1\]]kyi nad de bsal nas yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'dod pas na bsod nams tshad med par 'byung bar ci ste mi 'gyur/_rnam dbye bsgyur bas sbyar bar bya ste/_rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams shugs nam mkha' mnyam par rab tu 'byung ba smos ci dgos zhes bya'o/_/de lta bas na ci ltar

[\[53b.5\]]chu lha la sogs pa rnams dang /_drang srong rnams ni gnas 'jig dang /_gau ta ma dang /_tshangs pa la yang zhes bya ba ni rig byed can la'o/_/'di 'dra ba ni phan sems 'di yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i phan pa la sbyor ba'i blo gros bshad ma thag pa 'di lta bu byung ba dang /_
[\[53b.6\]]'byung ba lta zhog ste/_'byung ba yang 'gyur ram zhes bya ba yin la/_'byung bar 'gyur ba yang byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan 'ga' yang ma yin pa nyid do/_/yang ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na/_sems can de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste/_de dag ni ma la sogs

[\[54a.1\]]gnas skabs nas byung ba lta zhog_/rmi lam na yang ngo /_/brgya la gzhan gyi don du skye'o zhe na/_gzhan gyi don du ga la skye/_/zhes gsungs te/_'jig rten na bdag la sogs pa phongs pa yin la/_de nyid la yang med pa yin na gzhan gyi don du lta ga la srid/_

[\[54b.1\]]gang /_/de la gal te gzugs mchis na/_/nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/_/de bas kyang ni lhag par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/spyir bstan du zin kyang de lta na'ang 'jug pa'i sems kyis yin par blta bar bya ste/_de nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro/_/yang de nyid kyi

[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]yin nam/_brtson pa de gang du dgos she na/_tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis lan bstan pa'i phyir/_sdug bsngal zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_sdug bsngal las bral bar 'dod pa rnams srog gcod pa la sogs pa mi dge ba'i las rnams kyis
[\[55a.2\]]bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal phyir 'chos par 'dod pa dag dmyal ba la sogs pa'i g.yang sa'i sdug bsngal nyid myong ba'i rang bzhin la mngon par rgyug go/_/de nyid la phyogs shing 'jug pa yin te/_phye ma leb mar me'i rtse mo la mchongs pa bzhin du sdug bsngal
[\[55a.3\]]nyid la rab tu 'jug go zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de nyid kyi phyir bde ba 'dod pa nyid ni bde ba mngon par 'dod pa nyid rang gi bde ba dgra ltar 'joms so/_/rang gi bde ba gzhom pa'i phyir rang nyid dgra lta bur 'gyur ba ci lta bu zhe na/_gti mug pas zhes pa ste/_phyin ci log
[\[55a.4\]]gi dbang du gyur pa ste/_phan pa dang mi phan pa 'thob pa dang spong ba shes pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na gang zhig ces pa ni bsod nams kyi bdag nyid can rgyu med par mnyes gshin pa'o/_/de bas na phongs pa ni bde ba 'dod pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du bde ba ma rnyed
[\[55a.5\]]pa'o/_/sdug bsngal ni gzir ba'o/_/mang ldan zhes pa ni sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya phrag du ma mang pos gnon pa rnams so/_/de dag la zhes pa ni phyin ci log can la'o/_/lus las byung ba dang sems las byung ba thams cad kyi bde ba kun gyis tshim pa dang ste ngoms

[\[60a.3\]]'ong ldan/_/zhes pa ni ngang pa rnams kyi skad ni sgra'o/_/shin tu yid du 'ong ba ni nyams dga' ba ste/_de gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/ma rmos 'khrungs pa'i zhes pa ni ma rmos pa nyid de thong gshol gyis[(] glogs [,]slogs [)]pa med par skyes pa rnams yin la/_skyes pa'i lo
[\[60a.4\]]thog gi rnam pa ni 'bru'i khyad par ro/_/gzhan yang mchod par ni 'os pa'i rgyan rnams zhes pa la/_gzhan yang ni logs shig pa'o/_/mchod par bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba yin te/_rgyan rnams ni mdzes par byed pa rnams so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyi rab 'byams mthar
[\[60a.5\]]gtugs pa/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam mkha'i khams rab 'byam ni skabs sam rgya che ba'o/_/de srid kyi mthar gtugs pa ni de'i mthar thug pa'o/_/de dag kun ni brjod pa dang ma brjod pa dang 'dra ba yin la/_yongs su gzung ba med pa ni bdag gi ba ma yin pa rnams te/_gang
[\[60a.6\]]gis kyang rang gir ma byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/blo yis blangs nas zhes pa ni yid kyis zhes pa'o/_/thub pa skyes kyi mchog ni thub pa'i khyu mchog ste/_sras dang bcas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' dang ngo /_/legs 'bul ni legs par sbyin pa'o/_/yon gnas dam pa ni yon
[\[60a.7\]]gyi snod bla na med pa'o/_/thugs rje chen po rnams ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i dgongs pa can no/_/bdag la zhes pa ni zhan cing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can la'o/_/brtser dgongs ni thugs rje mdzod cig pa ste/_bdag
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]rjes su gzung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di dag ni 'di dag thams cad de dag gis mchod par sbyar ba'i dngos po'o/_/bzhes zhes pa ni bdag gir mdzod cig pa'o/_/de ltar yin na yang 'di ltar yid las byung ba'i mchod pa tsam ci'i phyir byed de/_/re zhig dngos po yid du
[\[60b.2\]]'ong ba de dang de dngos su ci'i phyir 'bul bar mi byed ce na/_bdag ni bsod nams mi ldan zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_bdag bsod nams ma byas pa de nyid kyi phyir bkren chen te/_bsod nams dag gis yo byad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin la de dang bral ba'i phyir mchod pa'i
[\[60b.3\]]nor gzhan te/_yo byad gang ci'ang bdag la ma mchis pa'o/_/des na bdag gi don slad ces bya ba ni bdag gi bsod nams bzhed pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyang gzhan don dgongs pa ni gzhan la phan pa dang bde bar bzhed pa yin te/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/mchod
[\[60b.4\]]pa'i yo byad brjod pa 'di bdag gis phul ba des na mgon po nyid kyi mthus te nyid kyi stobs bzhes shig pa'o/_/yang bdag dbang ba'i lus 'di yod pas de 'bul bar bya'o zhes rgyal dang zhes pa la sogs pa la gsungs pa la/_rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid kyang dbul
[\[60b.5\]]bar bgyi ste/_rnam pa kun gyis zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad du bdag gir khas blangs pa yongs su dor nas so/_/de'i sras rnams la'ang ste/_sems dpa' mchog rnams la'o/_/bdag ni yongs bzhes shig ces pa ni bdag so so nas yongs su bzhes shig pa'o/_/skyes
[\[60b.6\]]bu khyu mchog khyed kyi 'bangs su bran gyi dngos por khas blang bar bgyi ba ste/_'tsho ba la sogs pa 'tshol ba ma lags la/_'on kyang gus pas ni mchog tu gus pa ste/_sems dad pa'i stobs kyis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/'o na yang 'dir yon tan ci zhig yod ce na/_bdag

[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]las mi dge bas bsgribs pa dag rang la phan pa byed pa'i nus pa yang med pas sngon gyi zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_sngon ma shes nas las mi dge ba byas pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bgyid cing rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa la sogs pa rnams

[\[61a.4\]]rang bzhin zhes pa mu tig gis spras shing bkod pa'o/_/'od chags ni 'od gsal ba ste/_bla re nyid ni bla re yin la/_gang de dag yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o/_/gsal ba ni shin tu dri ma med pa ste/_'tsher ba ni 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/_/'di shel gyi yin pas shel zhes pa

[\[61a.6\]]rin chen rang bzhin bum pa ni de dag bai DUr+ya chen po yang yin la rin po che'ang yin te/_de'i rang bzhin no/_/du ma yin zhes pa ni brgya dang stong dang bye ba rnams kyis so/_/de bzhin gshegs dang de yi sras rnams la/_/glu dang rol mor bcas pas bdag khrus gsol/_/zhes pa
[\[61a.7\]]ni yid 'phrog pa'i glu dang gar dang rdza rnga la sogs pa'i rol mo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so/_/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa dang de'i sras so/_/mtshungs pa med pa ni mnyam pa med pa ste/_gos ni du ku la'i ras yin la/_gtsang ba ni dri ma bkrus pa ste/_dri
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]ma med pa zhes bya ba'i don to/_/dri rab bsgos pa ni a ka ru la sogs pa'i bdug spos rnams kyis so/_/sku ni sku ste/_phyi ba ni byi dor bya ba'o/_/de nas zhes pa ni phyis pa'i 'og tu'o/_/legs bsgyur ba ni legs pa'i tshon gyis shin tu legs par bsgyur ba ste/_legs pa'i

[\[61b.5\]]du 'dod la/_de lta bu de stong du bsgres pa ni stong gnyis pa bar ma yin te/_de stong ni stong gsum yin na gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de ltar de phyogs thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dang /_stong gsum thams cad du ngad ldang bar byed pa'i

[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]bkrus pa'o/_/de lta bur gyur pa yang yin la/_gser yang yin pa de'i 'od chags ni 'od zer zhes pa'i don to/_/de dang 'dra bar 'bar zhing 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/_/'di yang 'jig rten la grags pas bshad pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdzes

[\[64b.1\]]myur ba ni shin tu myur bar ro/_/khyed ci'i phyir rings she na/_bdag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_ji srid du sdig pa byang bar ma byas pa de srid du bdag 'chi bar ma gyur cig ces pa ste/_gzhan du na ngan song du 'gro bas 'jigs pa'i phyir ro/_/ci ste sdig pa byang bar ma byas par

[\[64b.3\]]stobs dang ldan pa'i lus yin no zhes brtan par mi bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_glo bur thog chen zhes te/_ma bsams par thog 'bab pa dang 'dra'o/_/gang zhig de ltar sdig pas 'jigs na 'o na ci'i phyir de byed ce na/_mdza' dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_mdza' ba
[\[64b.4\]]ni bdag dang bdag gi ba yin la/_mi mdza' ba ni de la gnod pa byed pa yin te/_mdza' ba la phan pa dang bde ba dang /_mi mdza' ba la zlog par byed pa'o/_/rnam pa sna tshogs byas pa ni srog gcod pa dang ma byin par len pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba ste rnam pa du ma'o/_/'di dag

[\[65a.1\]]yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir/_re zhig gnas pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te/_gnas pa zhes pa ni yod pa nyid na'o/_/'das pa ni mi rtag pa nyid kyis bzung bar bdag gis de ltar mthong ngo /_/gal te de ltar na de'i don du byas pa'i sdig pa

[\[69a.1\]]de yang phung po gsum pa gdon pa'i skabs su gsal bar 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i dka' 'grel/_shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros kyis byas pa las sdig pa bshags pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//_

[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]skabs so/_/sangs rgyas nyid ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs yin no/_/skyob pa rnams ni rang gi thugs su chud pa'i lam ston pa po rnams kyis te/_skyob pa nyid gzigs lam gsung ba zhes gang gsungs pa ste/_de gang la yod pa de la 'di skad ces bya'o/_/yang na skyob pa ni rgyun

[\[74b.1\]]des pa la/_/sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bgyi/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher 'byung ngo /_/rnam pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen med na/_phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon du bsgoms la sdom pa gzung ste/_sdom
[\[74b.2\]]pa rang gi nus pa dang sbyar la blang ngo /_/gzhan du na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams bslus par 'gyur ro/_/sdom pa 'di ni bud med nyon mongs pa chung ngu sems byang chub la mos pa rnams la yang skye bar
[\[74b.3\]]'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar ba las/_shA ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba yin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/_shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[74b.4\]]sems bskyed nas brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa dang /_dge ba'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i phyir zhes bya ba nas brtsams te gdams pa thams cad gsungs so/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di yang rgyu bzhis skye bar 'gyur te/_de ni 'di ltar chos bcu pa'i
[\[74b.5\]]mdo las bstan pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rigs la gnas par gyur pa byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis bskul zhing skyo bar byas/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste bla na med
[\[74b.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni byang chub kyi sems la mos pa'i rgyu dang po'o/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam/_byang chub kyi sems kyi bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni
[\[74b.7\]]rgyu gnyis pa'o/_/de sems can skyob pa med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_gling med pa rnams mthong nas snying rje'i sems nye bar gzhag ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du sems bskyed pa 'di ni rgyu gsum pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]pa'i sku rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas dga' ba bskyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni rgyu bzhi pa'o zhes so/_/'di dag ni byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa'i dngos gzhi'i las yin par rig
[\[75a.2\]]par bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa bstan nas/_mjug bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la/_sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug gsum dang 'brel par gzung ba ste/_las yongs su rdzogs pa ni 'bras bu yang nges
[\[75a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/yan lag gcig ma tshang bas ni de las bzlog pa yin no/_/de ltar zhes bya ba ni bstan pa'i rim pas so/_/bzung nas ni yang dag par blangs nas te bskyed nas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni blo gros dang ldan pa ste/_byang chub sems
[\[75a.4\]]dpa' zhes bya ba'i don to/_/rab dang bas zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba dang rab tu mgu ba yis te/_gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba la sogs pa'am 'dod rgyal gyis ma yin pa'o/_/rgyas par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzhan du gal te bzung nas gus pa zhan pa'am/_yid la
[\[75a.5\]]gcags par gyur na de'i tshe mi 'phel ba nyid dam/_yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar ni de bsrung ba dang dag pa dang spel bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar zhes bya ba ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas gzengs bstod do zhes pa ni spro bar bya ba'o/_/de nyid bstan pa ni/_deng du
[\[75a.6\]]bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te/_'khor ba thog ma med pa'i tshe rabs brgyud pa dag tu nam du yang 'di 'dra ba zhig thob par ma gyur to snyam du dgongs pa yin no/_/de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes/_/zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe byang chub
[\[75a.7\]]tu sems bskyed pa na'o/_/sangs rgyas sras su da gyur to/_/zhes bya ba ni nga rgyal khyad par du 'phags pa yid la byed pas sems dman pa nyid yongs su dor ba'o/_/rang rigs mthun pa'i las zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gdung dang 'tsham pa'i las so/_/skyon med
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]ces bya ba ni thog ma dang bar dang tha mar yongs su dag pa'o/_/rnyog par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni bdag gi nyes par spyad pas sdig pa ci nas kyang mi 'gyur bar ro/_/'di ltar yang rang gi sems yang dag par gzengs bstod par bya ste/_long bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
[\[75b.2\]]la/_long ba ni mig med pa'o/_/phyag dar phung po nas ni lam po che'i nyal nyil spungs pa nas so/_/'di dag thams cad ni shin tu yang 'phrad par dka' ba'o snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/'dir yang de nyid dpe nyid du de bzhin zhes bya ba gsungs te/_de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i mig med
[\[75b.3\]]pa dag la phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu 'khor ba nas ji zhig ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che dang 'dra ba skyes so/_/yang 'di ltar rab tu dga' bar bya ste/_'gro ba'i zhes bya ba la/_'jig rten gson po'i 'chi ba drung nas med par bya ba'i don du
[\[75b.4\]]byang chub kyi sems 'di bcud kyis len pa yang yin te/_sman gyi khyad par sna tshogs pa legs par sbyar ba gang zhig cho ga bzhin du bsten nas rga shi las grol bar 'gyur ro zhes 'jig rten na grags pa'i bcud kyis len bzhin no/_/'di zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so/_/skyes pa
[\[75b.5\]]ni byung ba'o/_/yang 'di ltar yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ste/_'gro ba'i nad ces bya ba ste/_'gro ba rnams kyi nad rnams ni na tsha thams cad do/_/mchog ni gtso bo ste/_lus las byung ba dang /_yid las byung ba'i nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/'di
[\[75b.6\]]zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems so/_/srid lam 'khyam pa ni skye ba'i srid pa dang /_'chi ba'i srid pa dang /_srid pa bar ma do'i rang bzhin te/_'khor ba'i lam na 'phyan pa'o/_/des dub pa ni yongs su ngal ba ste/_ngan 'gro ni sems can dmyal ba dang /_yi dgas dang /_
[\[75b.7\]]dud 'gro rnams so/_/de rnams dgrol bar byed pa ni 'da' bar byed pa ste/_de'i rgyu mtshan du/_spyi ste thun mong gi stegs yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub kyi sems so/_/bdag la skyes zhes bya ba thams cad du lhag ma'o/_/nyon mongs gdung ba ni tsha ba'o/_/de sel
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]ba'i phyir shar ba ste/_rab tu skyes pa'i sems zhes pa ni byang chub kyi sems so/_/de nyid ni zla ba phyed de kha ba'i 'od zer can te/_gdung ba thams cad sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/shar ba ni rab tu skyes pa'o/_/yang 'di ltar 'gro ba'i mi shes zhes
[\[76a.2\]]bya ba ni mi shes pa nyid ni rab rib yin te/_dngos po'i de kho na nyid 'gegs pa'i phyir ro/_/dpyis 'byin ni nges par 'byin pa'o/_/nyi ma chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nang gi rab rib sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/yang 'di ltar dam chos zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan
[\[76a.3\]]'das kyi gsung rab bo/_/de nyid ni 'o ma lta bu ste/_de bsrubs pa ni thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes rab kyis dkrogs pa ste dkrugs pa'o/_/mar gyi snying khu dang 'dra ba'i byang chub kyi sems byung ba yin te/_skyes pa yin no/_/rnam pa gzhan yang bde ba'i
[\[76a.4\]]longs spyod ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la/_bde ba'i longs spyad par bya ba la longs spyod par 'dod pa'i sems can gyi tshogs kyi bye brag ste/_spyad par 'dod pa la zhes bya ba ni longs spyad par 'dod pa'o/_/'di zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems te/_bde ba thams cad
[\[76a.5\]]'byung ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'bras bu ma thob pa nyid yin na yang lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas 'bras bu thob pa bzhin du brjod de/_dper na char pa 'bab pa na 'bras sA lu skyes so zhes zer ba lta bur byang chub tu sems bskyed pa nas phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob
[\[76a.6\]]bo zhes bya ba yang de bzhin no/_/'gron chen ni 'gron po ste/_de dang de'i 'gro bar 'gro ba dang /_'ong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/tshim par byed pa yin zhes bya ba ni bde ba thams cad kyis ngoms par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/da ni byang chub tu sems brtan pa nges par byas pa la sems dang
[\[76a.7\]]ba bskyed pa ni/_bdag gis de ring zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te/_'gro ba ni sems can 'jig rten no/_/mgron du bos zin pa ni bde bar gshegs pa nyid dang sangs rgyas nyid la'o/_/bar du bde la ni ji srid du sangs rgyas nyid du ma thob pa de srid kyi
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bar du lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bde ba la'o/_/skyob pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mdun du ste/_'di la bcom ldan 'das rnams kho na dpang du gyur pa yin no snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/lha dang lha min la sogs pa
[\[76b.2\]]dga' bar gyis shig ces bya ba bdag gi bsam pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi phan pa dang /_bde ba'i gzhi la zhugs pa 'di la lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa rnams sems rab tu dang bas yi rang bar gyis shig pa'o/_/byang chub sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug
[\[76b.3\]]pa'i dka' 'grel/_shes rab 'byung gnas blo gros kyis byas pa las le'u gsum pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_de ltar mjug rgyas par brjod nas/_sgrub pa snying por byed pa la byang chub yod kyi/_de las bzlog pa la ni ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_rgyal
[\[76b.4\]]ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_de ltar bstan ma thag pa'i cho gas byang chub kyi sems rab tu brtan par bzung nas/_byang chub sems dpas bslab pa la nan tan du bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpar gyur pas bslab par 'os pa gang yin pa la zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[76b.5\]]'da' ba ni 'gom pa'o/_/de las bzlog pa ni mi 'da' ba'o/_/de la 'bad pa ni dang du blang ba'o/_/g.yel ba med pa ni le lo med pa'o/_/ji skad du 'phags pa ga ya go ri las/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa snying por byed pa rnams la byang chub yod kyi sgrub pa snying por byed pa
[\[76b.6\]]ma yin pa rnams la ni ma yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang /_gzhon nu khyod kyis de lta bas na sgrub pa snying por byed par 'gyur ba de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/gzhon nu de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sgrub pa snying por byed pa la ni bla na med pa yang
[\[76b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka' ba ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa de yang pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshad med pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po la sogs pa'i dbye bas blo gros mi zad pa dang /_dkon mchog sprin la sogs pa'i mdo
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]rnams las rgya cher bslab par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i bslab pa la sogs pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar la yang byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa rnams la lta ci
[\[77a.2\]]smos/_gzhan du na ji ltar rnam pa thams cad du sems can gyi don bya bar nus par 'gyur/_mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi ngo bo grub pa 'di yang shes rab tsam yang ma yin la/_thabs tsam yang ma yin no/_/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
[\[77a.3\]]gtogs pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po la sogs pa 'di dag thams cad ni zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_longs spyod chen po dang /_'khor che ba dang /_yang dag par sems can yongs su smin pa dang /_sprul pa la sogs pa
[\[77a.4\]]mngon par mtho ba'i chos thams cad sdud par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes brjod do/_/shes rab ni thabs de nyid phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin du yongs su gcod pa'i rgyu yin no/_/don 'di yang rgyas par ni ka ma la shI la'i bsgom pa'i rim par blta bar bya'o/_/le'u 'dis
[\[77a.5\]]kyang de bsrung ba dang dag pa dang spel ba rnams sam/_yang na de bsrung ba 'ba' zhig bstan pa yin no/_/thog ma nyid du yang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la bdag nyid kyang nus pa yod dam med shes par byas la sdom pa mnod do/_/de nas sdom pa mnos pa'i byang chub
[\[77a.6\]]sems dpas 'di ltar bsam par bya'o zhes bab col zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_bab col zhes bya ba ni bab bab tu'o/_/brtsams pa gang yin pa ni legs par brtags pa'ang ma yin pa ste/_de la ni khas blangs su zin kyang bya ba'am btang zhes res kyis 'gre ba la
[\[77a.7\]]brten nas de ltar brtag par rigs na/_'di ni de lta ma yin no zhes sangs rgyas rnams dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhes bya ba ni lag bzangs kyis zhus pa la sogs pa'i mdo de dang de rnams las bsngags pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i sras ni shes rab chen
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]pos zhes bya ba ni/_'phags pa mgon po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa'i mdo rnams las so/_/bdag nyid kyis kyang nus pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni rang gi shes rab kyi nus pa dang mthun par brtags
[\[77b.2\]]pa'o/_/de la bshol du ci zhig yod de ci ste bshol bar byed ces bya ba'am/_gang la the tshom du gyur pa'i lhag ma ci zhig yod/_de bas na ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du legs par brtsams pa nyid rigs pa yin no/_/gzhan du na 'dir sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams
[\[77b.3\]]cad dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bslus par yang 'gyur ro/_/gal te de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_de ltar dam bcas nas zhes bya ba ni ma rgal ba bsgral bar bya ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol bar bya ba dang /_dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung bar bya ba dang /_yongs su mya
[\[77b.4\]]ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dbugs dbyung nas las kyis bsgrub par ma byas na ste/_gal te las kyi bya ba yis 'di rdzogs par ma byas na 'dis lha dang mi la sogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bslus shing brid na bdag gi 'gro ba
[\[77b.5\]]ci 'drar 'gyur te/_sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba las gzhan gyi 'gro ba med do snyam du dgongs pa'o/_/don 'di yang 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las bstan pa/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon po chen pos grong khyer gyi skye
[\[77b.6\]]bo thams cad la sang zan sbyin no zhes mgron du bos la bza' ba dang btung ba ma sbyar na des skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bslus pa yin te/_de la de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung ba'i zas ma thob pas 'phya zhing slar 'dong ba de bzhin du blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' gang ma
[\[77b.7\]]rgal ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba dgrol ba dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung la mang du thos pa dang /_de las gzhan dge ba byang chub kyi phyogs
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]kyi chos rnams kyi bar la yang brtson par mi byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bslu ba yin no/_/de lta bu de la sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing gzhogs 'phyas byed la rnam par smod de/_gang dag
[\[78a.2\]]mchod sbyin chen po bya bar dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i mchod sbyin gyi bdag po de dag ni dkon no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na tshig gang gis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten slu bar byed pa'i tshig de lta bu byang chub sems dpas smra bar mi
[\[78a.3\]]bya'o zhes 'byung ngo /_/dam bcas pa shin tu chung ba las 'da' na yang 'bras bu ltung ba lci bar 'gyur ba yin no zhes/_dngos po phal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_zan la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i dngos po cung zad tsam ste nyung zad tsam la yang 'di sbyin par bya'o snyam du
[\[78a.4\]]sems kyis rnam par bsams te/_slar yang de sbyin pa la sogs pa las ldog par byed pa de yang 'jig rten pha rol du yi dgas 'gyur gsungs na zhes bya ba ni lung nas brjod pa'o/_/de bzhin du tshig tu dam bcas nas sbyin par mi byed pa sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gsungs
[\[78a.5\]]so/_/bla na med pa ni gang las bla ma ste gong na med pa de ni bla na med pa'o/_/bde ba ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i mtshan nyid thun mong ma yin pa'o/_/skad gsang mthon po ni rtsom pa chen pos sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
[\[78a.6\]]rten gyi mdun du/_bdag gis de ring skyob pa thams cad kyi/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_bdag gis ma rgal ba bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa skad cher byas nas so/_/bsam pa thag pas ni gus pa chen pos so/_/don de ma grub na bdag gi 'gro ba ci 'drar 'gyur/_
[\[78a.7\]]de dag kyang dam pa'i chos dran nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las/_cung zad tsam zhig bsam pa las ma byin na yi dgas kyi 'gro bar skye la/_dam bcas pa las ma byin na sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan na/_'gro ba ma lus pa'i don bla na med pa dam bcas nas sgrub
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]par mi byed pa lta ci smos/_de bas na chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bden pa lhur byed par 'gyur bar bya ste/_rigs kyi bu bden pa yang dag par brjod pa ni chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la bden pa gang zhe na/_
[\[78b.2\]]gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems de srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhing /_sems can rnams la yang log par mi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa
[\[78b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sems te/_phyis yongs su gtong zhing sems can rnams la'ang log par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brdzun du smra ba tha ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar gyur na 'phags pa shA ri'i bus sngon gyi tshe rabs su byang chub
[\[78b.4\]]tu sems bskyed nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bas tshogs rnams la 'jug par byas shing /_sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu la bsnyen bkur byas nas/_de nas bdud kyis tho 'tshams pas byang chub kyi sems btang ngo zhes thos te/_de lta na'ang nyan thos kyi byang chub
[\[78b.5\]]thob nas sems can gyi don sgrub par nus par 'gyur ba 'di ji ltar drang zhe na/_gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_rnam pa thams cad du dngos po thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho nas mkhyen gyi las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_
[\[78b.6\]]las kyi tshul sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir don 'di tshu rol mthong ba'i spyod yul ma yin no/_/gang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon du byas te khas blangs pa'i byang chub kyi sems btang ba sngar dam bcas pa'i yul du bya ba'i sems can de rnams
[\[78b.7\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar byed pa nyid yin no/_/'di la rigs pa ni 'di snang ste/_'phags pa shA ri'i bus thar pa'i sems rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btang ba ni ma yin te/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems btang na'ang nyan thos kyi byang chub thob
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i phyir nus pa de la brten nas bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams sgrol bar 'gyur ba yin te nyes pa med do/_/zhar la 'ongs pa dor nas skabs la sbyar ba/_des na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa la/_
[\[79a.2\]]des na ste gang gi phyir sems can thams cad kyi don du khas blangs pa des na rgyu de'i phyir na'o/_/yang ci'i phyir de ltar yin zhe na/_gang phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'di la ltung ba dang bcas par gyur na/_sems can thams cad kyi don la
[\[79a.3\]]dman par 'gyur ro/_/gal te yang 'di la gang zag gzhan gyi byed pas sems can gyi don la dman par gyur pa de'i tshe gzhan de nyid kyi ltung ba yang lci bar gyur pa yin no/_/gang gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_gzhan zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' las
[\[79a.4\]]gzhan pa'o/_/skad cig kyang zhes bya ba la mig btsums pa'i bar dang /_yud tsam pa dang /_chu tshod phyed dang /_thun phyed la sogs pa'i dus lta re zhig zhog/_/skad cig gcig tsam gyi bar du yang ste/_bsod nams kyi gegs byed pa de'i ngan 'gro'i grangs bgrang bar mi nus so/_/
[\[79a.5\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can don ni bcom gyur pas/_/zhes bya ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba rnam par 'joms par byed pa des kyang sems can ma lus pa'i don nyams par byas par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar na 'di'i ngan 'gro la mu mtha' med pa yin zhe na/_'di'i 'thad

[\[80a.1\]]sogs pa gsungs te/_de bzhin zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i sdom pa lhod pa ste mi dge ba las mi ldog pa'o/_/bcad dang ni rkang lag dang rna ba dang sna la sogs pa'o/_/gshegs pa ni de dag nyid la mdung thung dang /_gsal shing dang mda' la sogs pa rnams kyis

[\[83a.1\]]'dir mthun par zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/_nyon mongs pa 'di dag ni de bzhin du rjes su 'brang na mi phan pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal shin tu skyed par byed pa yin te/_rang bzhin mi srun pa'i phyir nan gyis
